start_message:
👋 *Hey there!* I'm your assistant for accessing *exclusive content*.
*Subscribe* to the channel and use /check to verify your subscription. 🚀
error_message: ❗️ *Oops!* Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support.
subscribed_message: 🎉 *Awesome!* You're subscribed and now have access to *exclusive content*! 🔥
not_subscribed_message: 🚫 *You haven't subscribed yet!* Subscribe to the channel below to gain access. ⬇️
unknown_command_message: 🤔 Hmm... I don't recognize that command. Try again or use /help.
